general.error_massage: You entered wrong authentication code. Please try again
general.verification_tooltip_text: If you are having trouble receiving the verification code, you may have entered a wrong contact information. Please contact us.
general.sign_in_form_note: If you have an account, sign in with your email address.

If you have an account, sign in with your email address.
The verification code will be sent to the phone number you entered on your subscription.
